narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
This was a focused inspection regarding the direct non compliant 2.40 (b)(2) on the July 13, 2016 report.  The
animals have been seen by a veterinarian and are currently under treatment.
 
Inspection and exit interview conducted with licensee, Erika Leisner VMO, and Chad Proctor ACI.
